Pre-Game Insights: Roston Chase emphasized that controlling the Powerplay game is crucial for West Indies to control the contest.
West Indies were able to carry on the momentum after a strong start and completed a chase of 129 by the 11th over.
Miscellaneous Highlights: A win in their next fixture against South Africa places the West Indies in a good position to make it to the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024 semi-finals.
West Indies were able to improve their NRR substantially with a 9-wicket win over co-hosts USA and are now placed second in the Group 2 table.
South Africa sit at the top of the table with four points to their name and a net run rate (NRR) of +0.625.
Others: Roston Chase looked at his team's Powerplay game as a crucial determinant in their ability to control the contest.

West Indies went up against South Africa in May and recorded a 3-0 series win, but Chase was cautious to read too much into that result given how many first-choice players were missing from the respective teams.
